text: Chisimu Firiauna jwalikwesisye pa chilambo, ni ŵatesile achinsyene (chilambocho) kuŵa mikutula-mikutula, likuga line mwa jamanjao ŵalitondweye machili (ŵanache ŵa Israila ŵatesile kuŵa achikapolo), jwaliji nkusikita ŵanache ŵao ŵachilume ni kwalekaga umi ŵanache ŵao ŵachikongwe, chisimu jwalakwe jwaliji mwa akuwatanganya
